INSERT INTO carshare.route (Route_no, id, process, avgFee, start_address, start_latitude, start_hardness, end_address, end_latitude, end_hardness) VALUES('', '', '', 0, '', 0, 0, '', 0, 0);
INSERT INTO carshare.route (Route_no, id, avg_fee, process, start_spot, end_spot) VALUES(#{RouteNo}, #{id.id}, #{avgFee}, #{process}, #{startSpot.locationNo}, #{endSpot.locationNo})
